title: The War of the Third Awakening
description: The War between factions of an ancient alien race on Mars is over and peace within humanity's settlement of New Sardonia is left unsettled. The leader of PyraMoria has sequestered himself trying to obtain the answers of several unresolved questions left in the recent battles aftermath. Upon assembling the pieces of the puzzle the enemy’s true intentions are discovered. Meanwhile, on Earth, Professor Edward Fender finds himself teamed up with beautiful Jenny Greene, an agent of a secret society aligned against evil alien domination. They are joined by an unlikely enemy ally who has betrayed the leader of the Varatu, helping them escape the mad alien’s captivity. Now, they find themselves on the way to Mars in an effort to escape Valden’s vengeance.
author: David Lee Jones
